title: (x) Sleazenation stencil nameplate - Berthold Akzidenz-Grotesk {Tim D}
content:
Hi does anyone know the top font? (or any other good stencil faces)

Cheers

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sleazenation.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812192712/http:/typophile.com/files/sleazenation.jpg) | 60.6 KB |
author: marc

comments.content:
Looks a lot like AG book stencil, but it is not.

[http://www.bertholdtypes.com/bq\_library/90036.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812192712/http:/www.bertholdtypes.com/bq_library/90036.html "http://www.bertholdtypes.com/bq\_library/90036.html")

I think this is Akzidenz Grotesk bold and artificially stencilled, the S and Z aren't touched.  
This is another stencil face which is attractive  
 [http://www.optimo.ch/pages/departement/view\_font.php?id\_categorie=2&id\_f...](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812192712/http:/www.optimo.ch/pages/departement/view_font.php?id_categorie=2&id_font=1&id_font_type=5 "http://www.optimo.ch/pages/departement/view\_font.php?id\_categorie=2&id\_font=1&id\_font\_type=5")

Tim

Yes, I thought it might have been artificial too because of the S. You can try doing a search for Stencil on Myfonts.com or Fontshop.com (which now seems to have a keyword search!). I'm partial to Glaser Stencil.

Arston Stencil is very similar.  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/arston-stencil/](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812192712/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/arston-stencil/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/arston-stencil/")

Or Cargo  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/cargo/](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812192712/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/cargo/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/cargo/")

Cheers

Some of those are really good.

Also try:

[Ferro Stencil](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812192712/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=EF.109179.0.0)  
 [Paralucent Stencil](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812192712/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=EF.109179.0.0)

Patty - Actually, no keyword search on FontShop.com quite yet\*. Just happens that there are plenty of fonts with "stencil" in the name.

\* Soon!

I've always liked [DIN Schablonierschrift](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812192712/http:/www.sendung.de/dinschablonierschrift/) as a stencil face. It doesn't look like your sample, but it's cool.

- Lex

Club 21 fonts by Julian Morey has loads of stencil typefaces.

Nick Cooke
Somehow I like Glaser Stencil too!

_'..or any other good stencil faces..'_

Lovely ' [Jigsaw _( Stencil )_](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812192712/http:/www.typotheque.com/site/fonts.php?id=7)', by Johanna Balušíková..  
' [Bunker](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812192712/http:/www.omine.net/bunker.php)', by fellow Typophile Eduardo Omine..  
' [Water Tower](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812192712/http:/www.lineto.com/The+Fonts/Lineto+Legacy/Water+Tower/Regular/)', by Cornel Windlin..  
' [Kada](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812192712/http:/www.lineto.com/The+Fonts/Categories/Graphic+Fonts/Kada/)', by Joel Nordstroem..  
' [Exakt](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812192712/http:/www.die-gestalten.de/fonts/detail/?id=be0db81006c257d50106c6f651c100a2)', by Boris Dworschak..

_( FontScape ' [Stencil](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812192712/http:/www.fontscape.com/explore?7AT)', Veer ' [Stencil](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812192712/http:/www.veer.com/partner/link.aspx?i=1129&p=search/results.aspx?keyword=stencil&producttype=TYP)', FontShop ' [Stencil](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812192712/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&font_categories_search=font_name_search&searchstr=Stencil&image.x=0&image.y=0)', myFonts ' [Stencil](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812192712/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=Stencil)'.. )_

Dav
